description: In their work, a signature style goes beyond the blooms they incorporate. It’s all about the composition.
title: Innovative Floral Designers to Know
title_page: Innovative Floral Designers to Know - The New York Times
text:
In the work of today’s most innovative floral designers, a signature style goes beyond the kinds of blooms they incorporate. Instead, it’s all about the composition.
Here, a bouquet of wisteria and dried asparagus ferns designed by Sophia Moreno-Bunge.
